mapper.select: SELECT datas.name1 driverProvinceName, datas.code1 driverProvinceCode, datas.name2 driverCityName, datas.code2 driverCityCode, datas.dict_name driverDistinctName, datas.dict_code driverDistinctCode, tdriver.name driverName, tdriver.phone driverPhone, tdriver.driver_image driverImage, tdriver.driver_acc driverAcct, tdriver.driver_pass driverPass, tdriver.driver_idcard driverIdCard, tdriver.driver_code driverCode, tdriver.version version FROM t_driver_information_manage tdriver right JOIN ( SELECT t3.name1, t3.code1, t3.name2, t3.code2, t4.dict_name, t4.dict_code FROM ( SELECT t1.dict_code code1, t1.dict_name name1, t1.dict_parent_node parentcode1, t2.dict_code code2, t2.dict_name name2, t2.dict_parent_node parentcode2 FROM t_dict t1 LEFT JOIN t_dict t2 ON t1.dict_code = t2.dict_parent_node WHERE t1.dict_parent_node IS NULL ) t3 LEFT JOIN t_dict t4 ON t3.code2 = t4.dict_parent_node ) datas ON tdriver.is_delete = 0 AND tdriver.driver_code = #{driverCode} AND tdriver.provinceCode = datas.code1 AND tdriver.cityCode = datas.code2 AND tdriver.distinctCode = datas.dict_code HAVING driverCode = #{driverCode}
